sentences.english: Jingdezhen Yuan Dynasty greenish white porcelain was a heritage and development from the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 元代景德镇青白瓷是对宋代的继承和发展。

sentences.english: One of her recent hobbies is collecting small articles made from Jingdezhen porcelain.
sentences.chinese: 她近来的一个嗜好是收集景德镇的小件瓷器。

sentences.english: All the porcelains produced in Jingde Town are fine works of high-quality.
sentences.chinese: 景德镇的陶瓷每一件都是质优的精品。

sentences.english: The currently famous Jindezhen kiln was once the imperial kiln in that period.
sentences.chinese: 今天的景德镇瓷窑就曾经是当时的皇家瓷窑。

sentences.english: Liu, Wei: Chinese arts and crafts masters, Chinese Jingdezhen Ceramic Institute deputy director.

sentences.english: This is a description of the drive between Ming zadok the story of jingdezhen ceramic.
sentences.chinese: 这是一部描写明王朝宣德年间景德镇督陶官的故事。

sentences.english: Jingdezhen porcelain, made with a unique technique, is well-known far and near as a superfine product.
sentences.chinese: 景德镇瓷器以其独特的制作工艺而成遐迩闻名的精品。
